title: Prompts
description: Templated workflows exposed by MCP servers as slash commands

vscode+github-copilot.evidence: Prompts explicitly listed as supported: 'MCP servers can provide preconfigured prompts for common tasks that you can invoke in chat with a slash command.'

visual-studio+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs including Visual Studio. Prompts supported per docs.

jetbrains+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs. Docs state prompts are supported.

xcode+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot Xcode prompts - docs unclear on support level, marked as not supported.

android-studio+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs including Android Studio. Prompts supported per docs.

neovim+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support not available for Neovim.

emacs+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support not available for Emacs.

vscode+cline.evidence: Prompts supported: 'MCP hosts discover the capabilities of connected servers and load their tools, prompts, and resources.'

jetbrains+cline.evidence: Cline uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not mentioned in JetBrains context.

android-studio+cline.evidence: Cline uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not mentioned as supported.

vscode+continue.evidence: Prompts supported: 'Prompts map to Slash Commands in Continue'

jetbrains+continue.evidence: Continue uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. 'Prompts map to Slash Commands.'

android-studio+continue.evidence: Continue uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts map to Slash Commands.

vscode+cody.evidence: Not mentioned. Changelog only confirms tools support. PulseMCP only lists resources.

jetbrains+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not mentioned - only tools and resources supported.

visual-studio+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not supported - only tools and resources.

android-studio+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not supported - only tools and resources.

jetbrains+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not mentioned in docs.

visual-studio+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not mentioned in docs.

android-studio+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts not mentioned in docs.

neovim+tabnine.evidence: Prompts not explicitly mentioned in Tabnine MCP docs.

vscode+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium VS Code extension. MCP is only available in Windsurf IDE, Codeium's standalone product.

jetbrains+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium JetBrains extension. MCP is only in Windsurf IDE.

neovim+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium Neovim plugin. MCP is only in Windsurf IDE.

android-studio+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium Android Studio extension. MCP is only available in Windsurf IDE.

vscode+amazonq.evidence: Prompts explicitly supported via /prompts command with argument passing: @prompt-name arg1 arg2.

jetbrains+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts explicitly supported via /prompts command.

visual-studio+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts explicitly supported via /prompts command.

android-studio+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Prompts explicitly supported via /prompts command.

cursor+native.evidence: Prompts explicitly listed as supported: 'Templated messages and workflows for users'

zed+native.evidence: Partial support - prompts show as slash commands but only single-argument prompts work: 'if you define more than one argument, it'll ignore the prompt definition without notice.' Only works in text threads, not agent threads.

zed+claude-code.evidence: Uses Claude Code's MCP implementation. Claude Code supports prompts.

zed+codex-cli.evidence: Unknown - Codex CLI MCP documentation does not specify prompts support.

jetbrains+native.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. JetBrains AI Assistant MCP docs only describe tools support.

neovim+avante.evidence: Prompts supported: 'MCP server prompts will be available as /mcp:server_name:prompt_name in avante chat.'

neovim+codecompanion.evidence: Prompts supported: 'MCP prompts are available as slash commands via /mcp:prompt_name.'

neovim+amp.evidence: Prompts support unknown in Amp MCP docs.

neovim+augment.evidence: Prompts support unknown in Augment MCP docs.

emacs+gptel.evidence: Prompts not mentioned in gptel docs.

emacs+ellama.evidence: Ellama does not have MCP support.

claude-desktop+native.evidence: Claude Desktop is Anthropic's native MCP implementation. Prompts fully supported.

claude-code+native.evidence: Claude Code supports MCP prompts per documentation.

codex-cli+native.evidence: Codex CLI prompts support unknown per OpenAI MCP documentation.

gemini-cli+native.evidence: Gemini CLI supports prompts per documentation.

void+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - no clear documentation found for Void Editor MCP integration.

pearai+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - no clear documentation found for PearAI MCP integration.

firebase-studio+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Firebase Studio is new Google product, no MCP documentation found.

jules+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Jules is Google's async coding agent, no MCP documentation found.

lovable+native.evidence: Lovable MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on connectors.

xcode+native.evidence: No MCP support - Xcode has no built-in MCP integration.

android-studio+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Android Studio Gemini integration, MCP via third-party plugins.

vscode+amp.evidence: Amp MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on tools.

jetbrains+amp.evidence: Amp MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on tools.

neovim+amp.evidence: Amp MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on tools.

amp+native.evidence: Amp MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on tools.

vscode+augment.evidence: Augment MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on tools.

jetbrains+augment.evidence: Augment MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on tools.

neovim+augment.evidence: Augment MCP prompts support unknown - docs focus on tools.

vscode+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.

jetbrains+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.

android-studio+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.
